title: Dance Wand (?)
description: a wooden club with a nearly cylindrical shaft slightly flaring at one end, bending sideways, then ends into an almost spherical, hyper-stylized head; a short cylindrical crest is tangent to the head on the opposite side, and figures a pointed nose on one side, and a bunch of hair on the other; the ears are large and semi-circular, the eyes hardly visible, the mouth is a short slit perpendicular to an edge in the axis of the nose; a protuberance juts out on the throat under the chin; arrived with black metal mount
